name: Disney Infinity 3.0: Gold Edition
description: Enjoy Disney Infinity with a Full Toy Box! Disney Infinity 3.0: Gold Edition includes Star Wars with the existing collection of Marvel and Disney characters and worlds, and NOW with all Characters and Playsets Unlocked. Embark on adventures as big as your imagination in the 3.0 Toy Box!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 / ATI Radeon HD 5600 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.40 Ghz Intel Core i7-4700MQ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 960 GTX 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space
